KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances using the default cluster user.

MasterInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type, with support for HVM.

ComputeInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type, with support for HVM.

MinSize.Description: Initial number of compute EC2 instances / vCpus to launch within the cluster.

DesiredSize.Description: Desired number of compute EC2 instances / vCpus to launch within the cluster.

MaxSize.Description: Maximum number of compute EC2 instances / vCpus to launch within the cluster.

ComputeSubnetId.Description: ID of the Subnet you want to provision the Compute Servers into

SpotPrice.Description: Spot bid price for the ComputeFleet AutoScaling Group when the ClusterType = "spot". When awsbatch is the scheduler, this is spot bid percentage.

ClusterType.Description: Type of cluster to launch. Can either be "ondemand" or "spot". Choosing "spot" will cause the ComputeFleet AutoScaling group to launch EC2 Spot instances. Default value is "ondemand".
ClusterType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a supported cluster type: ondemand, spot

ProxyServer.Description: hostname and port of HTTP proxy server for cfn-init, boto and yum i.e. proxy.example.com:8080

VolumeSize.Description: Comma delimited list of size of EBS volume in GB, if creating a new one

VolumeType.Description: Comma delimited list of type of volume to create either new or from snapshot
VolumeType.ConstraintDescription: must be a supported volume type: standard, io1, gp2, st1, sc1

MasterSubnetId.Description: ID of the Subnet you want to provision the Master server into

AvailabilityZone.Description: Availability Zone the cluster will launch into. THIS IS REQUIRED

EBSSnapshotId.Description: Comma delimited list of Id of EBS snapshot if using snapshot as source for volume

CustomAMI.Description: ID of a Custom AMI, to use instead of published AMI's

VPCId.Description: ID of the VPC you want to provision cluster into. Only used with UseVPCBase=false

AccessFrom.Description: Lockdown SSH/HTTP access (default can be accessed from anywhere)
AccessFrom.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

ComputeSubnetCidr.Description: CIDR(s) for new backend subnet(s) i.e. 10.0.100.0/24. This is a comma-delimited list and can support multiple CIDR ranges for a multi-AZ cluster. The order and length of this list MUST match the AvailabilityZones parameter.
ComputeSubnetCidr.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

UsePublicIps.Description: Boolean flag to use public IP's for instances. If false, the VPC must be correctly setup to use NAT for all traffic.

VolumeIOPS.Description: Comma delimited list of number of IOPS for volume type io1. Not used for other volume types.

PreInstallScript.Description: Preinstall script URL. This is run before any host configuration.

PostInstallScript.Description: Postinstall script URL. This is run before any host configuration.

S3ReadResource.Description: S3 resource with read access from AWS ParallelCluster nodes

S3ReadWriteResource.Description: Addtional policy document to be added to EC2 IAM role created and assigned to all nodes.

Placement.Description: Type of placement requird in AWS ParallelCluster, it can either be cluster or compute.

PlacementGroup.Description: The name of an existing placement group

EncryptedEphemeral.Description: Boolean flag to encrypt local ephemeral drives. The keys are in-memory and non-recoverable.

PreInstallArgs.Description: Preinstall script args passed to the preinstall script.

PostInstallArgs.Description: Postinstall script args passed to the postinstall script.

EBSEncryption.Description: Comma delimited list of boolean flag to use EBS encryption for /shared volume. (Not to be used for snapshots)

EphemeralDir.Description: The path/mountpoint for the ephemeral drive

BaseOS.Description: Base OS type for cluster AMI
BaseOS.ConstraintDescription: must be a supported base OS

ScaleDownIdleTime.Description: Period in minutes without jobs after which compute node will terminate

SharedDir.Description: The path/mountpoint for the shared drive

CLITemplate.Description: cluster_template section used in the config.

AdditionalSG.Description: Additional VPC security group to be added to instances. Defaults to NONE

CustomChefCookbook.Description: URL of custom cookbook that will override the default. This will be unpacked and then dependencies resolved with Berkshelf.

ExtraJson.Description: Extra json to be added to Chef dna.json

EBSKMSKeyId.Description: Comma delimited list of KMS ARN for customer created master key, will be used for EBS encryption

MasterRootVolumeSize.Description: Size of MasterServer EBS root volume in GB

ComputeRootVolumeSize.Description: Size of ComputeFleet EBS root volume in GB

EC2IAMPolicies.Description: Attach additional IAM Policies to the created Root Role

EBSVolumeId.Description: Comma delimited list of existing EBS volume Id

AdditionalCfnTemplate.Description: A second CloudFormation template to launch with the cluster

CustomAWSBatchTemplateURL.Description: URL of custom batch template that will override the default one.

ResourcesS3Bucket.Description: S3 bucket where resources needed by the stack are located. The bucket gets deleted on stack deletion.

RAIDOptions.Description: Comma Separated List of RAID options

NumberOfEBSVol.Description: Number of EBS Volumes the user requested, up to 5

FSXOptions.Description: Comma separated list of FSx related options, 8 parameters in total, [shared_dir,fsx_fs_id,storage_capacity,fsx_kms_key_id,imported_file_chunk_size,export_path,import_path,weekly_maintenance_start_time]

EFSOptions.Description: Comma separated list of efs related options, 8 parameters in total, [shared_dir,efs_fs_id,performance_mode,efs_kms_key_id,provisioned_throughput,encrypted,throughput_mode,valid_existing_MTorNot]

Cores.Description: Comma seperated string of [master cores], [compute cores]. If set to -1,-1 no CpuOptions are set.

EFA.Description: Enable EFA on the compute nodes, enable_efa = compute

DCVOptions.Description: Comma separated list of NICE DCV related options, 3 parameters in total, [enabled,port,access_from]

Fn::Join: yum -y groupinstall development && yum -y install curl wget jq awscli
apt-cache search build-essential; apt-get clean; apt-get update; apt-get -y install build-essential curl wget jq python-setuptools awscli
|| error_exit 'Failed to run cfn-init. If --norollback was specified, check /var/log/cfn-init.log and /var/log/cloud-init-output.log.'

jq.command: jq --argfile f1 /tmp/dna.json --argfile f2 /tmp/extra.json -n '$f1 + $f2 | .cfncluster = $f1.cfncluster + $f2.cfncluster' > /etc/chef/dna.json || ( echo "jq not installed"; cp /tmp/dna.json /etc/chef/dna.json )

Allow access to resources in subnets behind front

MasterPrivateIP.Description: Private IP Address of the Master host

MasterPublicIP.Description: Public IP Address of the Master host

GangliaPrivateURL.Description: Private URL to access Ganglia (disabled by default)

GangliaPublicURL.Description: Public URL to access Ganglia (disabled by default)

ResourcesS3Bucket.Description: S3 user bucket where AWS ParallelCluster resources are stored
